Every movement starts with one voice. Whether you're a student, activist, teacher, or concerned citizen, this hands-on workshop will give you the tools to launch real-world campaigns and collect signatures that drive change.

In a world where silence fuels injustice, mobilization is a powerful act. This workshop is designed to help you build petitions, communicate your cause, and engage people who care; just like you.

What You'll Learn


  • How to create an effective online and offline petition


  • Tips for mobilizing supporters using simple tools


  • Legal and ethical aspects of petitions


  • Real-world examples from successful campaigns


  • How to connect your petition to political and social impact

You're invited to one of the most meaningful events of our year  a moment to gather, reflect, and recommit to the fight for human rights. The Annual Human Rights Dinner & Talk is more than a meal. Join us for powerful talks, a shared meal, and rich conversations that spark ideas and action.
